rows.name:
So you're the new leaders of the
Hr√¶svelgr Mercenaries?

rows.label: tlk43420145_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I hear all sorts of good things
about you.

rows.label: tlk43420145_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm glad to see you're carrying on
Vandham's traditions.

rows.label: tlk43420145_03_msg0004
rows.name:
And you have that Blade
Suzaku too, right? With those
unusual Dual Scythes?

rows.label: tlk43420145_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Feels like you really are carrying on
in Vandham's footsteps. Keep it up!
